Description: NEWLY RENOVATED CLUBHOUSE - NOW OPEN! The Residences at Springfield Station offers renters the very best combo of location and lifestyle. Situated near the brand new Springfield Town Center in Springfield, VA, The Residences at Springfield Station offers spacious apartment homes. Take a refreshing dip or just lounge around our resort-style pool. Get a work-out in at our fully-equipped Fitness Center or recharge in our newy remodeled lounge and game center.Location is King! The Residences at Springfield Station provides commuters with instant connectivity to the best of Northern Virginia, and offers residents easy access to Interstate 395, 495, and Fairfax County Parkway, walkable to the Metro, shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues.

Description: Tucked away in Springfield, VA, West Springfield Terrace offers lovely, country-style apartments for rent. Each renovated home is highlighted by an outstanding amenities package, complete with a welcoming clubhouse, state-of-the-art fitness center, sparkling swimming pool, shaded tennis court, and scenic views! You'll love the amenities inside your apartment, too, including an eat-in kitchen, dishwasher, and stackable washer/dryer. * West Springfield Terrace is just minutes from the Franconia-Springfield Metro (Blue Line) for an easy commute to DC. Not only are you close to public transportation, we'll even take care of getting you there with a convenient Metro bus stop at West Springfield Terrace's entrance. You'll also appreciate our accessibility to I-95 and Fairfax County Parkway, as well as West Springfield High School, Springfield Plaza, Springfield Mall, and many other shopping and dining options. Enjoy the good life at West Springfield Terrace!

Description: Located in Fairfax County, your new home apartment home at Springfield Square is only minutes from I-495 and I-395/95, your gateways to nearby shopping and dining in the surrounding Springfield area. Have your choice of nearby recreation at Springfield Mall, Tysons Corner, Lake Accotink or any the major attractions of the surrounding Washington D.C. area! Conveniently get where you need to go by using the bus stop in front of our community or the Virginia Railway Express (VRE) stop right across the street. Springfield Square apartment homes provide comfort and convenience with a complete list of features and amenities that neighboring communities lack. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around. Every convenience will be yours when you make Springfield Square your home today!

Description:
Get more rooms, live better and at an attractive price. 
QUICK MOVE-IN DISCOUNT AVAILABLE FOR SIGNING LEASE BEFORE SEPT 29!
This is located at the heart of the city with easy commute any direction like Tysons Corner, Fairfax, D.C., MD. It's in Spring Green Community Condominium right behind the Brookfield Plaza shopping center. 2 bed, 1 bath, living room, dining room, kitchen and a balcony.
- Easy commute with metro bus right outside your residential area and next to the highway 
- Peace of mind with school bus stop right outside at the property entrance 
- Convenient walking distance shopping center with everything from post office, haircut, banks, fast food, big chain restaurants, schools and grocery
- Hassle-free private parking space right outside condo building (up to 2)
- Worry free living with timely trash collection right outside, timely snow removal and great neighbors
- Relax in summer with Community Members Only swimming pool access and lifeguard 
- Clutter-free living with closets in each room including a Master bed with walk-in closet
- Central AC/Heat system with temperature control thermostat
- Allergy worry-free with beautiful polished hardwood floor in the entire condo
- Spacious and peaceful balcony with greenery for a peaceful afternoon 
- Extra storage room area for bikes and other things 
- Trash, sewer, gas, water, and parking is included in the rent price. Stove and Heating are gas so saves on the electricity bill.
How to get started?
Looking for responsible tenant to keep the home clean and comfortable in making payment and 1st-month security deposit (refundable at lease end).

Description: In the heart of the metro DC area, Springfield Crossing puts you right in the middle of it all. Surrounded by shopping and dining, Springfield Crossing offers you everything you want close to home. You’ll enjoy convenient access to I-95, I-495, I-395 and VRE or you can take the free shuttle to the Springfield Metro. At Springfield Crossing you’ll be able to find exceptional shopping, dining and entertainment at Springfield Mall or Old Town Alexandria and be located near nationally rated local schools.

Description: An established neighborhood in West Springfield, Springfield Gardens Apartments offers a unique combination of an excellent location that is close to major transportation routes and value because Springfield Gardens is affordably priced. Located off Old Keene Mill Road, Springfield Gardens is minutes from I-495 and I-395/95 as well as Springfield Towne Center featuring Macy's, J. C. Penny, and Target and a variety of restaurants. Springfield Gardens' generously sized sun filled rooms, ample closet space, color coordinated kitchens feel spacious and comfortable. If you are seeking a community with an excellent commuting location that offers spacious and comfortable residences, make Springfield Gardens your choice!

Description: Beautiful 3 lvl colonial w/ 4 000 sqft features hardwoods on main lvl; 9 ceilings throughout; Huge KIT w/ granite double wall ovens & 42-inch cherry cabinets. Sunroom walks out to spacious deck & Fam Rm offers gas fplce. Palatial MBR w/ 3-sided fplce sitting rm & 2 walk-ins. MBA has a soaking tub & separate shower. Great finished LL w/ wet bar & 2 bonus rms! Close to Ft Belvoir & Metro!

(678) 719-2783 - Spacious 2 Bd 1 Bth Beautiful Hardwood Floor Condo - Property Id: 37482
Get more rooms, live better and at an attractive price. 
QUICK MOVE-IN DISCOUNT AVAILABLE FOR MOVE-IN THIS MONTH!
Located in the heart of the city. Easy commute any direction like Tysons Corner, Fairfax, D.C., MD. Spring Green Community Condominium right behind the Brookfield Plaza shopping center. 2 bed, 1 bath, living room, dining room, kitchen and a balcony.
- Easy commute with metro bus right outside your residential area and next to the highway 
- Peace of mind with school bus stop right outside at the property entrance 
- Convenient walking distance shopping center with everything from post office, haircut, banks, fast food, big chain restaurants, schools and grocery
- Hassle-free private parking space right outside condo building (up to 2)
- Worry free living with timely trash collection right outside, timely snow removal and great neighbors
- Relax in summer with Community Members Only swimming pool access and lifeguard 
- Clutter-free living
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/7096-spring-garden-dr 
Property Id 37482
No Pets Allowed

Master bath has soaking tub separate shower and skylight. Deck Patio and Fence. One car garage Bus at door to Metro! close to I-95 495 Metro and Shopping. No smoking. Dogs on case by case. Two adults to qualify.
